messages.message: a lot of my services are failing to build due to the following error: `undeclared inclusion(s) in rule '@com_google_protobuf//:protoc': this rule is missing dependency declarations for the following files included by 'src/google/protobuf/compiler/main.cc': '/usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/13/include/stddef.h', ...`   anyone know how to fix this?
also seeing the error that liam is above, but maybe unrelated
also seeing `CRAFTING-IB-SETUPRC: command not found` when i open crafting terminal if that's helpful

That last line is very suspicious, that should be a comment in your `.bashrc`/ `.zshrc` before some commands to set up appropriate environment variables (which could explain the protoc error) -- I'll take a peek at your sandbox in a second!
